list.title: Open CV-Python tutorials
details: Introduction to OpenCV and Gui Features in OpenCV Learn how to setup OpenCV-Python on your computer Learn how to display and save images and videos, control mouse events

Core Operations and Image Processing in OpenCV learn basic operations on image like pixel editing, geometric transformations, code optimization, some mathematical tools etc learn different image processing functions inside OpenCV
Feature Detection and Description and Video Analysis learn about feature detectors and descriptors learn different techniques to work with videos like object tracking etc
Camera Calibration and 3D Reconstruction and Machine Learning learn about camera calibration, stereo imaging etc learn different image processing functions inside OpenCV.

Computational Photography and Object Detection learn different computational photography techniques like image denoising etc. learn object detection techniques like face detection etc. OpenCV-Python Bindings
MCQ test consisting of 40-50 questions
Guest Mentor talk
